Regulation Name(s): Trichomonas vaginalis Nucleic Acid Amplification Test System
Specimen Container(s): APTIMA Unisex Swab Specimen Collection Kit
APTIMA Vaginal Swab Specimen Collection Kit
Methodologies: Qualitative detection of ribosomal RNA using NAAT
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for APTIMA Trichomonas vaginalis Assay (Version 2) using NAAT for qualitative detection of Trichomonas vaginalis rRNA on PANTHER System.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro nucleic acid amplification test for detection of ribosomal RNA from Trichomonas vaginalis to aid in the diagnosis of trichomoniasis in symptomatic or asymptomatic women, using clinician-collected endocervical and vaginal swabs, and specimens collected in PreservCyt Solution on the PANTHER System.
